## RemirrorThemeContextType.get() method

Get a property from the active theme by it's path.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get<GReturn = any>(path: string | Array<string | number>, fallback?: any): GReturn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string &#124; Array&lt;string &#124; number&gt;</code> | a string or array path to search within the theme |
|  fallback | <code>any</code> | the value to use when no value found |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GReturn`
